resources.string: Press the button on the device. The led on it should turn from red to green when it\'s on. Then press the "connect" button on the screen to establish the connection between the device and the application. This may take a few seconds.
Create a profile for your plant

You can either browse our plant list to find your plant and get the default niche for it or you can create a brand new plant with the conditions you decide on. You can always adjust the them from the settings if necessary.
Keep an eye on your plant
The application will let you know if the environment measured by the device is optimal or not for your plant.
Here you can see all your plant profiles nicely displayed in a tree-like shape. You can modify any detail about the plants you own or about your own info.
